name: Cash Hacker
description:
Cash Hacker is all about raking in cash and building up a massive fortune. Apply for tech jobs to earn a wage in the background, and complete contracts to earn instant bank. Invest your hard earned (well really you just sat there) cash into a variety of investments from real estate, better computer hardware, to the live stock market!

Become the richest hacker on the face of the planet, and compete with your friends on the Game Center Leaderboards.

Features:
- Live stock market trading
- Upgrade your computer hardware to earn higher payouts
- Unlock achievements by being an awesome little hacker
- Become the CEO of the Internet
- Enjoy unless fun with the reset option
(which gives massive bonuses for the next round)

Update v1.2
We have realized that more money = more fun. So, we've multiplied wages by 16, multiplied experience and pay from completed contracts by 400, and lastly fixed a few UI bugs. Should be pretty awesome now!
